llm_command:
kubectl apply -n checkoutservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: checkoutservice-allow-currency
  namespace: checkoutservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: checkoutservice
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: currencyservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7000
EOF
